mapper.sql: id, nick_name, real_name, create_time, mobile, sex, address, member_state, member_type, login_password, email, country, province, city, county, town, neighbourhood, housing_estate
mapper.insert: insert into user ( id, nick_name, real_name, create_time, mobile, sex, address, member_state, member_type, login_password, email, country, province, city, county, town, neighbourhood, housing_estate ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberState,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{neighbourhood,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{housingEstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update user set nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_state = #{memberState,jdbcType=BIGINT}, member_type = #{memberType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, login_password = #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, town = #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, neighbourhood = #{neighbourhood,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, housing_estate = #{housingEstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
